name: HarmEvil
blurb: HarmEvil is a 2D side-scroller mixed with a Bullet Hell for both recreation and competition.

rewards.reward: THANKS: You will be listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer
BACKER: You will receive a digital copy of HarmEvil in addition to being listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer
GENTLEMAN: Two digital copies of HarmEvil (one for you and one for a friend), and you will be listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer.

TESTER: You will receive an exclusive invitation to become a HarmEvil Beta Tester. This means once an essentially complete version of our game is ready, we will immediately contact you, and you will have the chance to play-test HarmEvil at least a month before its release. This reward tier also includes a digital copy of HarmEvil, and a your name on our website as a HarmEvil backer

COLLECTOR: You will receive a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil containing all the goodies: One disk copy of HarmEvil, and a miniature guide, signed by every member of the HarmEvil team, giving you everything you need to beat all the bosses, collect all the trophies, and feel like a boss. Backers for this tier also get their name listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer. We're also throwing in a free digital copy of HarmEvil for all backers in for this tier or higher!
WEARER: You will get a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil and all its contents along with a one-of-a-kind HarmEvil T-Shirt. You also get to have your name listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer

DISPLAYER: Backers for this amount will receive a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil in addition to a HarmEvil poster (also signed by every member of the HarmEvil team), and their name will be listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer

ACQUIRER: If you decide to back for this amount you will receive a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil, a HarmEvil poster, a HarmEvil T-Shirt, and your name will be listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer

MASTER: We will secretly insert your name somewhere in one of the 25+ levels. We will also give you our email account to talk to us about HarmEvil (or anything really) and possibly even become friends with us. You also receive a specially boxed edition of HarmEvil, a HarmEvil T-Shirt, a HarmEvil poster (signed by every member of the HarmEvil team), and your name will be listed on our website as a HarmEvil backer

100-LIFE-PASSWORD-HOLDER: One of the ten backers for this amount will receive the 100 life password (we describe it on the left). You will also get our Skype account, and will have the chance to videochat with the team. This tier also includes the personal email of Oneironaut Games, so you can send us an email to get on skype! Your name will also be shown in the HarmEvil credits in the "100 Life Password Holders" section. In addition to that, you will also receive a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil, a HarmEvil poster (signed by our entire team), a HarmEvil T-Shirt, and your name will be listed on our website not as a backer, but as one of the "100 Life Password Holders", so your HarmEvil reputation will be legendary!

CREATOR: You can work together with the HarmEvil team to create an awesome character that would fit into HarmEvil. The character you create would come with its own world, music, enemies, boss(es), and epic boss(es). Details on this tier are explained further on the left. This reward tier also includes a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil, a HarmEvil poster signed by our team, and a HarmEvil T-Shirt. To top it all off you will be specially credited for your ingenious character, both in the credits and on our website.

CAMPER: Leave a GIGANTIC footprint in the HarmEvil world! Whoever backs this tier can brainstorm with the HarmEvil team, and work with us on an entirely new game mode. The details of this tier are on the left. Backers for this pledge amount also receive a specially boxed copy of HarmEvil, a HarmEvil poster signed by every member of the HarmEvil team, a HarmEvil T-Shirt. As far as the game credits, or our website, you'll get the credit for this brilliant new game mode. We respect your dedication if you back for this tier, because you will be laying a large part of HarmEvil's foundation.
